allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: I See You - head tracking 3D display

- 3D head that follows viewer''s gaze using webcam tracking
- Off-axis projection for immersive "window into world" effect  
- MediaPipe FaceMesh for iris-based head position tracking
- Placeholder head with eyes that look at the viewer
- Support for custom GLTF head models with bone-based tracking
- dat.GUI controls for model positioning and tracking parameters

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
